details.description:
This Ridgewood neighborhood backs right up to Bushwick, serving as it's older and wiser sibling :) You can enjoy all of the same delicious cuisine, fair trade hot (and necessary) coffee, unique locally owned businesses, bodegas and grocers, and centralized transportation as it's neighboring Brooklyn areas, all while keeping that lovely community feel of a slightly more residential and peaceful existence. *Long exhale* now that's the right choice. Conveniently located off the L train and the B13, B38, B57 bus routes.
FEATURES: Hardwood Floor Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Shared Laundry Room Pet Friendly First; Security NO FEE

Beautiful 3 beds/4 bath duplex with exposed brick, ample closet space and great light. Apartment features exposed brick, beautifully tiled bathrooms, dishwasher, microwave, Central A/C, hardwood floors, views on Manhattan from the windows. Location is prime Bushwick, steps to the Central Ave (M), and just a few blocks from the L at Morgan or Jefferson, and not far from Myrtle Wyckoff JMZ.
Massive 4 bed/4 bath in prime location! Apartment features high end kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, laundry in unit, high ceilings and exposed brick. Pets ok! NO fee!

details.description:
An unbeatable location right between Williamsburg and Greenpoint! You won't even have enough days in a year to visit all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, locally owned businesses, thrift shops, bike shops, and the list goes on and on!! This building offers you the chance to be a short walk to the Lorimer/Metropolitan area of East Williamsburg, the Bedford/Waterfront area of Williamsburg, AND the McCarren Park/Manhattan Ave area of Greenpoint. Oh, to have such opportunity!
Conveniently located off the L and G trains as well as the B24 and B48 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors High Ceilings Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher and Microwave Central A/C and Heat Excellent light from many windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Laundry Room Finished Roof Deck Virtual Doorman
First; Security NO FEE

Do not miss out on this 3 bed / 1 bath apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhood's easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom in Bed-Stuy, Brooklyn. Pet-friendly! A delightful 3-bedroom unit conveniently located next to Saratoga Park, just one block from the Halsey J train. All rooms are generously sized, complemented by fantastic common areas. The building features basement laundry facilities. If you prefer staying close, there's a backyard to enjoy.

Within close proximity to the 2 and 5 subway lines and many cafes and restaurants.

Welcome to this stunning 3-bedroom apartment located in the heart of prime Williamsburg.
Prepare to be amazed by the size of the backyard - it is truly MASSIVE (and we mean MASSSIVE!!!). This outdoor oasis provides an exceptional space for entertaining, gardening, or simply unwinding in privacy.
The apartment offers generously sized living spaces and bedrooms, ensuring ample room for relaxation and comfort.

Don't wait, as this unit is sure to go quickly! Contact us now to secure this incredible opportunity.
Experience the luxury of a new renovation, combining modern features with the charm of Williamsburg living.
Make this stunning 3-bedroom apartment your new home and indulge in the beauty of prime Williamsburg living.

Welcome to 130 South 2nd St, where spaciousness and convenience converge in this remarkable residence.
Featuring four large bedrooms, this apartment offers plenty of room for comfortable living. Each bedroom provides ample closet space to accommodate your storage needs.
Natural light fills every corner of this home, creating a bright and inviting ambiance.
The open concept kitchen seamlessly blends with the huge living room, providing a perfect space for entertaining guests or relaxing with loved ones. A skylight adds an extra touch of natural light and charm to the living area.
Nestled in an amazing location, this apartment is just steps away from the JMZ trains and the Bedford L, allowing for easy access to transportation and exploring the vibrant surrounding neighborhoods.
Experience the best of comfort, space, and location at 130 South 2nd St. Don't miss this opportunity to call this residence your new home.
